column5: Some of the interesting things that happen in the winter here in Vermilion Bay.....plus a shameless plug for the local Kinsmen club....good work men!http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SKxZz...aEQwO3VCD_OQRw

Now that's the way to deal with a long winter! That country is beautiful when it's green or when it's covered with snow. Great video.....did you have a hand in the filming? Looks like it could be some of your work.

Loved the "dog-sled race"....thanks for sharing (shameless plug or not for the local Kinsmen club - ha).....what Larry said is true....you have a country that is beautiful when it's green or when it's covered with snow (though I love it when it's green and the waters are sky blue).Rich B
That was great! Not great enough to get me up there until July! Later, Jay
I wish we could deal with cabin fever like that instead of the daily grind. Wish I lived there!
Great video Gord... the 48th Vermilion Bay Kin Karnival ... What a great tradition !!!!

Thanks, Gord. Great video. But man, does Bryce always get so downright contemplative and speechless on cold winter days? I expected to see him tearing around on a V8 powered sno machine of his own design and manufacture.
